URLSearchParams.description: Different visual options for this widget.

URLSearchParams.name: ws
URLSearchParams.description: The Streamer.bot websocket server.

URLSearchParams.name: font-family
URLSearchParams.description: The Font Family (Case Sensitive).

URLSearchParams.name: font-weight
URLSearchParams.description: The Font Weight.

URLSearchParams.name: font-style
URLSearchParams.description: The Font Style.

URLSearchParams.name: font-size
URLSearchParams.description: The Font Size.

URLSearchParams.name: font-color
URLSearchParams.description: The Font and the mute icon color (HEX values unsupported).

URLSearchParams.name: chip-background
URLSearchParams.description: The background of the chips.

URLSearchParams.name: chip-border-radius
URLSearchParams.description: The border radius of the chips.

URLSearchParams.name: Only Include/Exclude certain audio sources
URLSearchParams.description: You can't use both at the same time

URLSearchParams.name: exclude
URLSearchParams.description: The audio sources to only exlude

URLSearchParams.name: include
URLSearchParams.description: The audio sources to only include

URLSearchParams.name: ws
URLSearchParams.description: The Streamer.bot websocket server.

URLSearchParams.name: theme
URLSearchParams.description: Different visual options for this widget.

URLSearchParams.name: position
URLSearchParams.description: Where the progress bar list should be located.

URLSearchParams.name: nowrap
URLSearchParams.description: This makes the progress bars to not wrap around the available space.

URLSearchParams.name: row
URLSearchParams.description: This puts all the progress bars in rows next to each other.

URLSearchParams.name: column
URLSearchParams.description: This puts all the progress bars in column on top of each other

URLSearchParams.name: include
URLSearchParams.description: Use this to only include a specific set of id's

URLSearchParams.name: exclude
URLSearchParams.description: Use this to exclude a specific set of id's

URLSearchParams.name: width
URLSearchParams.description: Changes the width of the progress bar. Note: this will overwrite the width even if you're using themes.

URLSearchParams.name: background
URLSearchParams.description: The background behind the progress bar (HEX values unsupported).

URLSearchParams.name: background-progress-bar
URLSearchParams.description: The background of the progress bar (HEX values unsupported).

URLSearchParams.name: background-border-radius
URLSearchParams.description: The border radius of the progress bar.

URLSearchParams.name: animation-duration
URLSearchParams.description: The duration of the animations.

URLSearchParams.name: transition-duration
URLSearchParams.description: The duration of the transitions for the progress bar.

URLSearchParams.name: The cycle feature lets all of the progress bar cycle. Enabling this feature will only show one progress bar at a time, and cycle through the progress bar list with transitions.
cycle
URLSearchParams.description: Enable the cycle feature.

URLSearchParams.name: cycle-duration
URLSearchParams.description: How long each progress bar should be visible before continuing with the cycle (in MS only).

URLSearchParams.name: cycle-transition-duration
URLSearchParams.description: How long the cycle transition should take (in MS only).

URLSearchParams.name: cycle-transition
URLSearchParams.description: Which transition should be used.

URLSearchParams.name: font-family
URLSearchParams.description: The Font Family (Case Sensitive).

URLSearchParams.name: font-weight
URLSearchParams.description: The Font Weight.

URLSearchParams.name: font-style
URLSearchParams.description: The Font Style.

URLSearchParams.name: font-size
URLSearchParams.description: The Font Size.

URLSearchParams.name: font-color
URLSearchParams.description: The Font Color (HEX values unsupported).

URLSearchParams.name: twitch-cheers-action-on-progress
URLSearchParams.description: The action to run when the progress bar updates.

URLSearchParams.name: unit
URLSearchParams.description: Choose between celsius and fahrenheit.

URLSearchParams.name: force-time
URLSearchParams.description: Force the time of the widget.

URLSearchParams.name: force-icon-time
URLSearchParams.description: Force the time of the icons.

URLSearchParams.description: Turns the animated icons off.

URLSearchParams.name: lat
URLSearchParams.description: The latitude.

URLSearchParams.name: lon
URLSearchParams.description: The longitude.

URLSearchParams.name: font-family
URLSearchParams.description: The Font Family (Case Sensitive).

URLSearchParams.name: font-weight
URLSearchParams.description: The Font Weight.

URLSearchParams.name: font-style
URLSearchParams.description: The Font Style.

URLSearchParams.name: font-size
URLSearchParams.description: The Font Size.

URLSearchParams.name: font-color
URLSearchParams.description: The Font and the mute icon color (HEX values unsupported).

URLSearchParams.name: border-radius
URLSearchParams.description: The border radius of the widget.

URLSearchParams.name: background
URLSearchParams.description: Changes the background color, allows CSS gradients. This will remove the day/night background colors (HEX values unsupported).

URLSearchParams.name: weather-name
URLSearchParams.description: Sets the automated weather name to a customized name for things like your location (?lang will have no effect).

URLSearchParams.name: weather-name-prefix
URLSearchParams.description: A text you can add before the weather name.

URLSearchParams.name: weather-name-suffix
URLSearchParams.description: A text you can add after the weather name.

URLSearchParams.name: weather-name-subtitle
URLSearchParams.description: A text you can add under the weather name.

URLSearchParams.name: You can use the Open Weather Map API for this widget, it requires the open-weather-map-api-key url parameter. When you have given this API key the weather widget will use this data for the icons and temprature. All URL parameters will work the same.
open-weather-map-api-key
URLSearchParams.description: Your open weather map API key.
